name: Awesome People Set
description:
The Awesome People set consists of 5 cards: Amelia Earhart, Albert Einstein, Martin Luther King, Jr., Abraham Lincoln, and Beatrix Potter.
The cards are 5 inches x 7 inches and each card has an illustration on the front and 5-10 facts on the back. They come in a sleeve.
Li’l Stories provide you with inspiration when you need to tell a story on the spot — whether it’s at bedtime, over dinner, or while traveling: Abraham Lincoln always wore a tall hat. He carried important letters in it . . . the rest of the story is up to you. Sets ship within 5 business days.

name: Cool Places Set
description:
The Cool Places set consists of 5 cards: Egyptian Pyramid, Eiffel Tower, Petra, Statue of Liberty, and Taj Mahal.
The cards are 5 inches x 7 inches and each card has an illustration on the front and 5-10 facts on the back. They come in a sleeve.
Li’l Stories provide you with inspiration when you need to tell a story on the spot — whether it’s at bedtime, over dinner, or while traveling: In 1923, the future mayor of Montmartre bicycled from the first floor of the Eiffel Tower to the ground, using the tower’s leg as a ramp . . . the rest of the story is up to you. Sets ship within 5 business days.

name: Great Animals Set
description:
The Great Animals set consists of 5 cards: Elephant, Lion, Monkey, Penguin, and Platypus.
The cards are 5 inches x 7 inches and each card has an illustration on the front and 5-10 facts on the back. They come in a sleeve.
Li’l Stories provide you with inspiration when you need to tell a story on the spot — whether it’s at bedtime, over dinner, or while traveling: When elephants swim in deep water, they use their trunks as a snorkel . . . the rest of the story is up to you. Sets ship within 5 business days.

name: Mysterious Objects Set
description:
The Mysterious Objects set consists of 5 cards: Air Balloon, Bicycle, Gramophone, Steam Engine, and Telephone.
The cards are 5 inches x 7 inches and each card has an illustration on the front and 5-10 facts on the back. They come in a sleeve.
Li’l Stories provide you with inspiration when you need to tell a story on the spot — whether it’s at bedtime, over dinner, or while traveling: The Montgolfier Brothers’ first passengers in their air balloon were a sheep, a duck, and a rooster . . . the rest of the story is up to you. Sets ship within 5 business days.

name: Li'l Stories Set
description:
The Li'l Stories set consists of the Awesome People set, Cool Places set, Great Animals set, and Mysterious Objects set.
Each set consists of 5 cards: Awesome People: Amelia Earhart, Albert Einstein, Martin Luther King, Jr., Abraham Lincoln, and Beatrix Potter Cool Places: Egyptian Pyramid, Eiffel Tower, Petra, Statue of Liberty, and Taj Mahal Great Animals: Elephant, Lion, Monkey, Penguin, and Platypus Mysterious Objects: Air Balloon, Bicycle, Gramophone, Steam Engine, and Telephone
The cards are 5 inches x 7 inches and each card has an illustration on the front and 5-10 facts on the back. They come in a sleeve and the four sets are tight together with a Li'l Stories rubber band.
Li’l Stories provide you with inspiration when you need to tell a story on the spot — whether it’s at bedtime, over dinner, or while traveling: Abraham Lincoln always wore a tall hat. He carried important letters in it . . . the rest of the story is up to you. Sets ship within 5 business days.
